\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
\subsubsection*{template$<$typename ADDR$>$\newline
class sockpp\+::datagram\+\_\+socket\+\_\+tmpl$<$ ADDR $>$}
Base class for datagram sockets. 

Datagram sockets are normally connectionless, where each packet is individually routed and delivered.

Creates a pair of connected stream sockets. 

Whether this will work at all is highly system and domain dependent. Currently it is only known to work for Unix-\/domain sockets on \texorpdfstring{$\ast$}{*}nix systems.

\hline
\end{DoxyParams}

A std\+::tuple of stream sockets. On error both sockets will be in an error state with the last error set. 
\end{DoxyReturn}
